projectVision: A comprehensive brainstorming organizer to help teams manage and organize their ideas effectively

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Allow users to register and log in securely
features.User Problem: Users need a secure way to access their personal brainstorming data

features.title: Drag and Drop Interface
features.description: Enable users to move cards between columns using drag and drop
features.User Problem: Users want an intuitive way to reorganize their ideas visually

features.title: Export Functionality
features.description: Allow users to export their brainstorming data
features.User Problem: Users need to share or backup their brainstorming sessions

features.title: Real-time Collaboration
features.description: Enable multiple users to collaborate in real-time
features.User Problem: Teams need to collaborate on brainstorming sessions simultaneously
